chapters.title: Chapter 18: News for the Dragon
chapters.info: Covril, p. 396—Ogier from Stedding Shangtai, daughter of Ella daughter of Soong. She is a fine Speaker. She came to Caemlyn searching for her son Loial, and went with Haman and Erith to the Two Rivers to find him. She is determined to marry him off so as to settle Loial down.
